departments.name: Maktab Department
departments.purpose: Providing basic Quran education and foundational Islamic teaching across an extensive network of maktabs throughout the region.
departments.impact: 150+ maktabs operational with thousands of students enrolled across the region.
departments.support: Teacher salaries, learning materials, maktab infrastructure.

departments.name: Madrasa Department
departments.purpose: Supporting city madrasas with expanded Quran education programs and structured Islamic studies curriculum.
departments.impact: Multiple madrasas supported with enhanced educational programs.
departments.support: Madrasa operations, teacher support, educational resources.

departments.name: Courses Department
departments.purpose: Organizing structured Islamic courses including the signature 40-day course covering core Islamic subjects.
departments.impact: Hundreds of graduates completing Islamic education courses annually.
departments.support: Course materials, instructor fees, venue arrangements.

departments.name: Children's Organization Department
departments.purpose: Dedicated to children's Islamic development through organized events, structured learning, and youth engagement activities.
departments.impact: Engaging children in Islamic learning through creative and structured programs.
departments.support: Event organization, children's materials, activity resources.

departments.name: Dawah Department
departments.purpose: Conducting outreach activities and Islamic awareness campaigns to strengthen faith and understanding in the community.
departments.impact: Reaching hundreds of community members through awareness and outreach programs.
departments.support: Campaign materials, event logistics, outreach resources.

departments.name: Publications Department
departments.purpose: Managing Quran printing, Islamic book distribution, and educational material publication for widespread access to Islamic knowledge.
departments.impact: Thousands of Islamic books and Quran copies distributed across the community.
departments.support: Printing costs, distribution logistics, material development.

departments.name: Examination Department
departments.purpose: Conducting student testing and academic evaluation to ensure quality educational standards across all maktabs.
departments.impact: Standardized evaluation system ensuring consistent educational quality.
departments.support: Examination materials, evaluation tools, administration costs.

departments.name: Financial Support Department
departments.purpose: Managing financial sponsorship programs to support teachers, students, book printing, and operational costs of the Trust.
departments.impact: Enabling the entire trust operations through community financial support.
departments.support: All sponsorship tiers contribute directly to trust operations.
